casebody.data:
William Murphy, Respondent v. The Broadway and Seventh Avenue Railroad Company, Appellant. Decided January 11, 1892. Appeal by defendant from judgment entered in favor of the plaintiff upon the verdict of a jury and from order denying defendant’s motion for a new trial. Root & Clarke, for appellant. *497Shaffer & Burt, attorneys, and Chauncey Shaffer of counsel, for respondent.

Before Freedman, P. J., McAdam and Gildersleeve, JJ.

Per Curiam.

Judgment and order affirmed, with costs.
